data.eml:eml: Simonachorutes, a new genus of Pseudachorutinae (Collembola, Neanuridae) from Europe

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skarżyński, Dariusz, Arbea, Javier I., Piwnik, Agata (2016): Simonachorutes, a new genus of Pseudachorutinae (Collembola, Neanuridae) from Europe. Zootaxa 4205 (2): 171-179, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.2.6
